extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Product and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is running a vulnerable version of EcoStruxure products.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which EcoStruxure product is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Update EcoStruxure Control Expert to V16.1
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install version V16.1 of EcoStruxure Control Expert to fix the vulnerability. Reboot the computer after installation.

extracted_playbook.title: Update EcoStruxure Architecture Builder to V7.0.18
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install version V7.0.18 of EcoStruxure Architecture Builder to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update EcoStruxure Control Expert Asset Link to V4.0 SP1
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install version V4.0 SP1 of EcoStruxure Control Expert Asset Link to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Vijeo Designer to V6.3SP1 HF1
extracted_playbook.description: Contact Schneider Electric Customer Support to obtain and install Vijeo Designer version V6.3SP1 HF1.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply General Mitigations for Other EcoStruxure Products
extracted_playbook.description: Limit authenticated user access, implement User Account Control practices, and follow workstation, network, and site-hardening guidelines.

extracted_playbook.title: Backup and Test Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Employ back-ups and evaluate the impact of patches in a Test and Development environment or on an offline infrastructure.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control and safety system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from the business network.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Physical Security Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Install physical controls to prevent unauthorized access to industrial control and safety systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use secure methods like VPNs for remote access, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Mobile Data Exchange Methods
extracted_playbook.description: Scan all methods of mobile data exchange with the isolated network before use in terminals or any node connected to these networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

affected_products: EcoStruxure Control Expert: Versions prior to V16.1
EcoStruxure Architecture Builder: Versions prior to V7.0.18
EcoStruxure Control Expert Asset Link: Versions prior to V4.0 SP1
Vijeo Designer: Version prior to V6.3SP1 HF1
